About

Have you ever wanted to see what your favourite tech stack would look like as a sandwich? No? Well, with Stackwich you can! See what tasty and bizzare sandwiches you can create using your favourite frameworks, or try to unlock all the most popular combinations already in use by developers!

Project by Matthew Farah :^)
